name: tm90
effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user makes a copy of itself using
some of its HP. The copy serves as
the user’s decoy.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user electrifies the ground for five turns,
powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the
ground no longer fall asleep.
